text: Aldgate may refer to: *Aldgate, one of the city gates of the City of London and a road near the site of Aldgate. Now a Ward of the City of London *Aldgate tube station in the City of London *Aldgate East tube station in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets *Aldgate, Rutland a village in the County of Rutland, England *Aldgate, South Australia, a town in the Adelaide Hills in Australia
title: Aldgate (disambiguation)
